name: adv-web-tech-project
description: A project with a NestJS backend and a Next.js frontend.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd chatbot-backend && venv\Scripts\python manage.py runserver"
